</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#9632;</font>Attachment V</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Table
of Comparison of Revised Procedure for the Company&#8217;s Handling Procedure for
Endorsements and Guarantees</font></div>
      <div align="left">
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3 The targets of endorsements and guarantees</font></td>
                <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      3 The targets of endorsements and guarantees</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company may only provide endorsements for the following:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)Firms
      with which the Company has business dealings.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)Firms
      in which the Company controls over 50% of the voting rights (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)A
      firm that controls over 50% of the voting rights in the Company (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company may only provide endorsements for the following:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)Firms
      with which the Company has business dealings.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)Firms
      in which the Company controls over 50% of the voting rights (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)A
      firm that controls over 50% of the voting rights in the Company (either
      directly or indirectly).</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Firms
      directly or indirectly 100% controlled by the Company may provide
      guarantees to one another.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Firms
      directly or indirectly controlled by the Company <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">up to 90% or
      more</font> may provide guarantees to one another <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">subject to a board
      resolution with the amount not exceeding 10% of the Company's net worth as
      shown in its most recent financial statements. The above rule does not
      apply to guarantees provided to one another by firms 100% directly or
      indirectly controlled by the Company.</font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Rule
      2 does not apply to endorsements made to companies in which all
      contributing shareholders have a joint investment relationship according
      to their shareholding percentages, and it shall receive the
      endorsement.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Rule
      2 does not apply to endorsements made to companies in which all
      contributing shareholders have a joint investment relationship according
      to their shareholding percentages, and it shall receive the
      endorsement.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      aforementioned contribution refers to funds provided directly by the
      Company or through a company 100% owned by the Company.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      aforementioned contribution refers to funds provided directly by the
      Company or through a company 100% owned by the Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4&#160;Guarantee Ceiling</font></td>
                <td colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      4&#160;Guarantee Ceiling</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Combined
      guarantees provided to third parties shall not exceed 100% of the
      Company's net worth as shown in its most recent financial
      statements.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Combined
      guarantees provided to third parties shall not exceed <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">40%</font> of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">the Company's</font>
      net worth as shown in its most recent financial
  statements.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Guarantees
      provided to any single business shall not exceed 30% of the Company's net
      worth as shown in its most recent financial statements.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Guarantees
      provided to any single business shall not exceed 30% of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">the Company's</font>
      net worth as shown in its most recent financial
  statements.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
      </div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div align="left">
        <div align="left">
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Combined guarantees
      provided by the Company and subsidiaries to third parties shall not exceed
      45% of the Company's net worth as shown in its most recent financial
      statements.</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Combined guarantees
      provided by the Company and subsidiaries to any single business shall not
      exceed 35% of the Company's net worth as shown in its most recent
      financial statements.</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">As
      well as the above rules, guarantees provided to a business the Company has
      dealings with shall not exceed the amount associated with the dealings the
      Company has with it. Amount associated with dealings with a business refer
      to income arising from products sold or services provided or cost incurred
      as a result of purchases of goods or services, whichever is higher, in the
      most recent one year.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">As
      well as the above rules, guarantees provided to a business the Company has
      dealings with shall not exceed the amount associated with the dealings the
      Company has with it. Amount associated with dealings with a business refer
      to income arising from products sold or services provided or cost incurred
      as a result of purchases of goods or services, whichever is higher, in the
      most recent one year.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5&#160;Procedure for Providing Guarantees</font></td>
                  <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="middle" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      5&#160;Procedure for Providing Guarantees</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Before
      granting a guarantee to a business having a quota provided by the Company,
      the business shall provide the Company with details including amount,
      length of time and nature of the guarantee it requests. The guarantee
      shall be granted only after the Finance Department evaluates the risks
      involved and the request is approved by the board.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Before
      granting a guarantee to a business having a quota provided by the Company,
      the business shall provide the Company with details including amount,
      length of time and nature of the guarantee it requests. The guarantee
      shall be granted only after the Finance Department evaluates the risks
      involved and the request is approved by the board.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Finance Department shall check the credit history of the business
      requesting a guarantee and evaluate the risks involved. The following
      aspects shall be evaluated when conducting an evaluation:</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Necessity
      and reasonableness for the guarantee</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Creditworthiness
      of the business to which a guarantee is provided and the risks
      involved</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      impact the guarantee has on the Company's operating risks, financial
      condition and shareholders' rights and interests</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Is
      collateral required and how much it is worth if it is</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(5)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">For
      a guarantee provided to a business the Company has dealings with, is the
      amount guaranteed commensurate with the amount of dealings
      involved</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Finance Department shall check the credit history of the business
      requesting a guarantee and evaluate the risks involved. The following
      aspects shall be evaluated when conducting an evaluation:</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Necessity
      and reasonableness for the guarantee</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Creditworthiness
      of the business to which a guarantee is provided and the risks
      involved</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      impact the guarantee has on the Company's operating risks, financial
      condition and shareholders' rights and interests</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(4)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Is
      collateral required and how much it is worth if it is</font></div>
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 63pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(5)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">For
      a guarantee provided to a business the Company has dealings with, is the
      amount guaranteed commensurate with the amount of dealings
      involved</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      determined by evaluation to be necessary, collateral shall obtained and
      properly dealt with (hypothecated, pledged etc).</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If
      determined by evaluation to be necessary, collateral shall obtained and
      properly dealt with (hypothecated, pledged
etc).</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div id="FTR">
              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
            </div>
            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Finance Department shall keep a written record of guarantees the Company
      provides, indicating the parties and amounts guaranteed, dates they were
      passed at board meetings or approved by the president, and periods during
      which guarantees are valid. It shall evaluate all the aspects stated above
      and indicate in the record conditions the Company must meet to be relieved
      of its guarantee responsibility or the date when that
    happens.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Finance Department shall keep a written record of guarantees the Company
      provides, indicating the parties and amounts guaranteed, dates they were
      passed at board meetings or approved by the president, and periods during
      which guarantees are valid. It shall evaluate all the aspects stated above
      and indicate in the record conditions the Company must meet to be relieved
      of its guarantee responsibility or the date when that
    happens.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="2%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="48%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font size="+0"><font size="+0"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">In
      addition to the above four rules, when the Company or a subsidiary
      provides another subsidiary, whose net worth is less than 1/2 of its
      paid-in capital, with a guarantee the Finance Department of the Company or
      subsidiary providing the guarantee shall pay constant attention to the
      guaranteed subsidiary</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">'s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">&#160;finances,
      sales and creditworthiness. If major risks are found to exist, a written
      report shall be submitted to its board of
      directors.</font></font></font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>

      <div align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#9632;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Attachment VI</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Advanced
Semiconductor Engineering, Inc.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Table
of Comparison of the Revised Articles of Incorporation</font></div>
      <div align="left">
        <table cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original
      Provisions</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provisions
      after Revision</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Share
      certificates of the Company are all registered in form, which shall be
      signed or affixed with seal by more than three directors as well as duly
      attested before they can be issued.</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      7:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Share
      certificates of the Company are all registered in form, which shall be
      signed or affixed with seal by more than three directors as well as duly
      attested before they can be issued. <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">According to Article
      162.2 of the Company Act, the Company may choose to not provide share
      certificates in print form.</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Article
      19.1:</font></font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Board meetings shall
      be notified to directors and supervisors seven days in advance with the
      reason indicated. In an emergency, a board meeting may be called at any
      time.</font></font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notifications of board
      meetings may be in writing or via email or fax.</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      27:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      articles of incorporation were passed at a founders' meeting</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">held
      on March 11, 1984.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      first amendment was made on May 3, 1984.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#65294;</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#65294;</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fifth amendment was made on June 19, 2008.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-sixth amendment was made on June 25, 2009 .</font></div>
              </td>
              <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      27:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      articles of incorporation were passed at a founders' meeting</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">held
      on March 11, 1984.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      first amendment was made on May 3, 1984.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#65294;</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#65294;</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fourth amendment was made on June 28, 2007.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-fifth amendment was made on June 19, 2008.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      thirty-sixth amendment was made on June 25, 2009.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">The thirty-seventh
      amendment was made on June 14,
2010.</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
